answerText: Anna Christie[10] This playwright wrote about a silver bullet killing The Emperor Jones in one play and also wrote Anna Christie and Long Day's Journey into Night.
heading: 2012 Penn-ance |2012 | 2 | 13 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Johnny the Priest owns a bar in this work, and the crew of the Simeon Winthrop rescues Mat Burke, who later falls in love with the title character. For 10 points each: [10] Name this play in which Chris meets up with his daughter who he lost at age five. Chris's daughter, the title character, recalls getting raped and becoming a prostitute.
